title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: The steps seem to go on endlessly, seemingly trying to touch the dark heavens in a slow ascent.  The bone railing ends, no longer a safety net for the careless traveller.  A thin covering of the fine grey dirt rests on the steps in large patches.

The steps seem to go on endlessly, seemingly trying to touch the sky in a slow ascent.  The bone railing ends, no longer a safety net for the careless traveller.  A thin covering of the fine grey dirt rests on the steps in large patches.
